mapper.insert: insert into tempcat_notice (noticenum, id, title, contents) values (tempcat_notice_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.select:
select noticenum, id, title, contents, to_char(inputdate, 'YY/MM/DD') inputdate, hits, originalfile, savedfile, nickname from tempcat_notice join (select id, nickname from tempcat_member) using(id)
where title like '%' || #{_parameter} || '%'
order by noticenum desc
mapper.update: update tempcat_notice set hits = hits+1 where noticenum = #{noticenum}
mapper.insert: insert into notice_reply (num, id, nickname, noticenum, contents) values (notice_reply_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{nickname}, #{noticenum}, #{contents} )
mapper.update: update notice_reply set contents = #{contents}, inputdate = default where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select * from tempcat_notice where rownum < 4 order by noticenum desc
select * from tempcat_notice where noticenum in (select max(noticenum) maxnum from tempcat_notice) and id = #{id}
